name: @wasmer/wasix
description: Isomorphic Javascript library for interacting with WASI(X) Modules.
author: Wasmer Engineering Team <engineering@wasmer.io>

scripts.build:dev: wasm-pack build --dev --reference-types --weak-refs --target web . -Zbuild-std=panic_abort,std && wasm-strip pkg/wasmer_wasix_js_bg.wasm && rollup -c --environment BUILD:development
scripts.build: wasm-pack build --release --reference-types --weak-refs --target web . -Zbuild-std=panic_abort,std && wasm-strip pkg/wasmer_wasix_js_bg.wasm && rollup -c --environment BUILD:production
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
